title: Remove test key (scrub) and implement freedom cmd

milestone.title: Version 1.0
milestone.description:
THE BIG BANG. THE FIRST REAL RELEASE. THE HYYYYPE

The initial functionality we need for this bot to replace our limited-functionality Dyno bot instance in the Order's discord.

body:
Test account got hijacked. Fixed that, the key is void now, but to make up for the nonsense the bot spread after hijacking, we need a freedom cmd.

!freedom should probably a glorious giphy link of a eagle or a bajillion flags of free countries

title: Youtube player

milestone.title: Version 1.1
milestone.description:
Goals:
Hook generation complete
Dice roller complete
Initiative and basic combat tracker
Link commands: links for music, ambience, and content gen, available on request

body:
Let's hook up a youtube search/queuer. There's a super straightforward tutorial here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z4S2qqX7YvA

### Feature Request
- Playlists and queueing/skipping music
- Fantastic for "ambience bot" features

title: Integrate OpenDND
body:
OpenDND has tons of great DM focused functionality, and we can use it! https://github.com/opendnd/opendnd/

### Feature Request
- This is a dungeonary hookup intended for use in worldbuilding and improv
- Could be fantastic for character creation too

title: Shenanigans!
body:
Idea from a friend on discord -- roll for drinks? and what adventures you were on while you were out?

Cmd: !shenanigans
Output:
@User, you got the Dwarven Brew StoneHammer! While you were out, you had
- 3 brawls with old ladies
- found a cash of gold and spent it on more drinks!
- found a kobold. Take good care of it!
- robbed a dragon, don't go outside for 30 years

This is dungeonary, and could be useful for DMs in certain niche situations

title: RAM Usage Cmd

body: !memory - Show system RAM%.

title: Banhammer Joke Cmd
body:
!banhammer @user 

Ascii hammer? 30 second mute, permission locked above the Warforged role?

title: Refactor functions to return the response expected
body:
Hard to summarize. The bot currently replies every single function - which I find nice for a default, but there are cases where that's not quite the best it can be. Also, it's easy to do, just tedious.

All functions return a string right now. I think they should return an object like
{ 'response': 'current string response', 'type': '.....see below' }
where the type is one of 'reply', 'plain', or possibly other solid types. A reply would tag the caller and output the response in a conversational way. A plain response would just output to the bots primary channel. I can imagine there are other types but I'm sleepy and writing this is boring

title: README Overhaul

milestone.title: Version 1.0
milestone.description:
THE BIG BANG. THE FIRST REAL RELEASE. THE HYYYYPE

The initial functionality we need for this bot to replace our limited-functionality Dyno bot instance in the Order's discord.

body:
The Main README needs an overhaul, and should only contain info that probably won't change. Reqs:
- Basic info about the bot, call to action for suggestions
- Running the bot: Non-developers
- Running the bot: Developers
- Running the bot: Persistent bot (Advanced guide)
- Using help to figure out what it does
- Contribution guide

The dungeonary readme also needs an overhaul
- Basic info, invite for suggestions
- Using it: Developers
- Rights of users to do whatever with it
- Coming soon: Webpack, minified dungeonary for website plugin and throwing in custom places

title: New Version Output to Channel
body:
When a new version drops, the bot should reload per #47 and pop a shortlist of new features into the default botchat channel. Perhaps this should be a releasenotes file, with a smart bit of logic on service restart?

Format:
Botname has levelled up to X.Y! New features:
- list of features, probably by github issue title

title: Async Performance Thoughts
body: We should at least attempt to support async stuff. That sets a good foundation for scale in case people really like this bot

title: Sass joke cmd upgrade

milestone.title: Version 1.1
milestone.description:
Goals:
Hook generation complete
Dice roller complete
Initiative and basic combat tracker
Link commands: links for music, ambience, and content gen, available on request

body:
!sass @user

Ideas include tagging the user in a sassy message, sassing the user and then muting them for 10 seconds, or random variants of a sass message. This would ideally be a decent gag and not an admin command, probably in the chatter.js file in discordlib (or whichever novelty code file replaces it someday) 

Future ideas for sass: contact the owner of this and see if we can use these http://www.dmsguild.com/m/product/236600

title: Initialize Twitch Integration
body:
This would be DOPE. https://dev.twitch.tv/

Once this is closed, create new cases for:
- List top live D&D streams (should be easy)
- Add/remove 'known' streamers for listing statuses of (by twitch url? uname?)
- Auto-notify/Post when a known streamer goes live or shuts down (this is the hard part)

PS: Checkityoooo: https://www.npmjs.com/package/twitch-api-v5

title: Consider resources like these for dungeonary
body: https://github.com/mrprim/random-rpg-stuff/tree/master/src/generators

title: Mod command to hide channels unless a user has a certain role
body:
Something like
!lockchannel channelname role1 role2 ... roleX
Which hides the channel for anyone that doesn't have any of roles1..roleX

title: Handy mod commands
body: Ideas include adding and deleting roles, kicking people, a funny no-impact banhammer command

title: Init Automod Module
body:
Certain filtering and ban actions can be automated, because not everyone is super civil at times

Ideas:
- Word filters: Some are warnings, some are next-time-you're-banned, and some are autoban
- Role/permission lockdown for banned people as an option instead of pure kicks

title: Character and NPC generator Specs
body:
Creating NPC/PC
- class+spec (title only, no powers)
- race+sub (include stat mods)
- background from table
- profs
- stats
- 2 knives by default
  - Knife theory table!

title: Basic Dungeon Generator
body: Figure out who said it - MT Black? - that there's a perfect formula for a dungeon. It was easy to replicate too: it's got an entrance, traps, loot, fights, secrets, and a boss. We could make a simple ascii map generator that prints out a legend with randomized attributes, giving us dungeons from 5 to like 20 rooms.

I'd like to be able to run an npm script to build this and export it for a website. This could bring a lot of neat features to a page without having to duplicate code.

Could be a great chance to use Parcel

title: Roll Macros in Discord
body:
!macro monkPunch 1d20+7, 1d4 + 2 + 1d6

We want to stash good macros like this. Probably save the last 256 or so. Then we can roll them with

!macro monkP

Because prefix is life.

title: Move Lookup
body: This is pretty specific to dungeon world, but could be pretty handy.

title: Spell SRD Lookup

milestone.title: Version 1.1
milestone.description:
Goals:
Hook generation complete
Dice roller complete
Initiative and basic combat tracker
Link commands: links for music, ambience, and content gen, available on request

body:
Dig through SRDs for spells. Param one should be the system (5e, PF, fate, DW, AW, SR, etc), and if we have an SRD included in the app for it, run a search and return the spell info. Prefix search should be adequate

Input: !spell 5e fireball, !spell PF cure light
Output: Appropriate spell info or an informative error
